item.title: Go Web Server - Why Two Log Outputs?
item.description: The Go Program Create a very simple Go web server as follows, by saving the following Go code into a file called server.go: package main import ( "io" "log" "net/http" ) // Function Home - that handles a web server request for a page func Home(w http.ResponseWriter, req *http.Request) { // write some text to the calling web browser io.WriteString(w, "Hello World!") // output to the console that we did something log.
